channel.title: Npc dialogue help
channel.description:
ok so i tryed adding npc dialogue but i get this error and it confuses me. If you can help me fix it also tell me why its happening (i like learning new things)
[code].\Server\Server.java:64: cannot access server.model.players.npcTalk bad class file: .\server\model\players\npcTalk.java file does not contain class server.model.players.npcTalk Please remove or make sure it appears in the correct subdirectory of the classpa th. public static npcTalk npcTalk = new npcTalk(); ^ Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
also if you want to help me some more then add my msn znick55@gmail.com

item.title: Npc dialogue help

item.description:

ok so i tryed adding npc dialogue but i get this error and it confuses me.
If you can help me fix it also tell me why its happening (i like learning new things)
